choiceresponse.p: Select the ‘More’ button at the top of any dashboard.

label.h3: Which of the following options are available?

div.p: Under the ‘More’ button, found at the top of any dashboard, the following options are available: Star/Unstar dashboard, Show/Hide description and Print. “Show interpretations and details” is available through the context menu in the upper right-hand corner of the visualization. Although download is not an available option, dashboards can be printed, which can allow you to save them in PDF format depending on your printer settings.
